channel.title: How to Make Server Public
channel.description:
I need someone to add me on msn and explain to me in intense detail on how to make my server online and avilable to the public my msn is as follows..
funky-monkey@hotmail.com
i'm on all the time please add me,ALSO! There is allways and also i need help on how to add models because i want to add the bandos scimitar and whip thanks all hope ur chirstmas was good and i hope u make my day =) cherryo. :P

item.title: How to Make Server Public
item.dc:creator: @Indentatus Indentatus
item.description:
@Indentatus wrote:

Yes Portforward, I would add to MSN but I’m too tired:(

Make sure your firewall is not blocking your server (that was my problem), even if it doesnt ask you to unblock it, MAKE SURE it is unblocked.
Add the port 43594 to your firewall exception list, to TCP, but I add UCP as well.

Then get into your router, port forward the port number 43594 to TCP, UDP too if you wish.

It’s also going to ask for your Internal IP in there too… which for expample a Linksys one would be 192.168.1.1.xxx

If you have any questions feel free to PM me

Read full topic
